policy_info.insurance_company_name: Royal Sundaram General Insurance Co. Limited
policy_info.policy_name: Advanced Top Up Health Insurance Plan

limit_details.type: Up to Sum Insured (Lumpsum for CI / Indemnity for Hospitalization)
limit_details.description: Cancer of Specified Severity covered as Critical Illness. Hospitalization for cancer covered up to SI over deductible.

covered_treatments: Malignant tumor treatment (incl. leukemia, lymphoma, sarcoma)
conditions_and_notes: Benefits payable over and above the deductible amount. (Page 1, B Preamble)
Initial 30-day waiting for any illness (non-accidental). (Page 17, E.1.2)
Definition of 'Cancer of Specified Severity' with its own exclusions applies for CI benefit. (Page 2, C.1.7.1)
Maternity Expenses (childbirth, miscarriage unless accidental, lawful MTP) are excluded. (Page 19, E.1.18)
Ectopic pregnancy is an exception to the exclusion (i.e., covered if it meets policy terms). (Page 19, E.1.18.i)
Benefits payable over and above the deductible amount. (Page 1, B Preamble)
Refractive error correction < 7.5 dioptres excluded. (Page 19, E.1.15)

limit_details.type: Up to Sum Insured (Lumpsum for CI / Indemnity for Hospitalization)
limit_details.description: Kidney Failure Requiring Regular Dialysis covered as CI. Dialysis also covered under hospitalization over deductible.

dialysis.related_to_illness: Kidney Failure Requiring Regular Dialysis / Chronic Renal Failure
conditions_and_notes: Benefits payable over and above the deductible amount. (Page 1, B Preamble)
Initial 30-day waiting for any illness (non-accidental). (Page 17, E.1.2)

cancer.type_or_condition: Carcinoma in situ, benign, pre-malignant tumors etc.
cancer.details: Full list of histologically excluded tumor types in 'Cancer of Specified Severity' CI definition.

cancer.unless_condition_met: Evidence of metastases to lymph nodes or beyond.

cancer.type_or_condition: Malignant melanoma not invading beyond epidermis
Prostate tumors not meeting Gleason score >6 or TNM T2N0M0
Non-invasive papillary bladder cancer TaN0M0 or lesser
Gastro-Intestinal Stromal Tumors T1N0M0 or below, mitotic count â‰¤5/50 HPFs
Tumors in presence of HIV infection

maternity.condition: All maternity expenses (childbirth, C-sections, miscarriage unless accidental, lawful MTP)
maternity.unless_condition_met: Ectopic pregnancy treatment is covered (exception to exclusion).

maternity.details: Includes contraception, sterilization, ART (IVF, etc.), gestational surrogacy, reversal of sterilization.

cataract.unless_condition_met: Claim arising due to an Accident.

dialysis.condition: Claims for Chronic Renal Failure within 24-month waiting period
dialysis.unless_condition_met: Claim arising due to an Accident.

dialysis.condition: Dialysis for kidney conditions not meeting 'Kidney Failure Requiring Regular Dialysis' (CI definition) or not requiring medically necessary hospitalization
dialysis.details: CI benefit has specific definition (Page 4, C.1.7.6). Hospitalization must be medically necessary.
